messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Help
messages.msgSnippet: ... Go to www.sengokudaimyo.com for a start. Lists all you would want to know about armor. Also, check The Samurai Sourcebook by Stephen Turnbull, and Arms
messages.messageBody:
--- melonhedlibi <melonhedlibi@...> wrote:
> I am a student and i am doing a project on samurai's
> and i was
> wondering if anyone could help me. all i need is a
> discription of
> what they wore when they were in full armor.
>
> Thank You
>
>
>

Go to www.sengokudaimyo.com for a start. Lists all you
would want to know about armor.

Also, check "The Samurai Sourcebook" by Stephen
Turnbull, and "Arms and Armour of the Samurai"

Nate

messages.messageBody:
I am a student and i am doing a project on samurai's and i was
wondering if anyone could help me. all i need is a discription of
what they wore when they were in full armor.

Thank You

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Help
messages.msgSnippet: have you tried books by Stephen Turnbull on the Samurai? Try samurai warlords the book of the daimyo .. also there is a wealth of info on the net on the
messages.messageBody:
have you tried books by Stephen Turnbull on the Samurai? Try "samurai warlords the book of the daimyo".. also there is a wealth of info on the net on the samurai. theres one site to start with at www.angelfire.com/zine2/samuraiworld....
bbux4evr <bbux4evr@...> wrote: Hi my name is Brian, and I'm trying to do a speech on the Samurai. I
was wondering in anyone could e-mail me some information, maybe about
the beginnings, how it was used, or how it may be used now. If you
could help me out, that would be great.

My e-mail address:

bbux4evr@...

Thanks.

Brian

messages.subject: Help
messages.msgSnippet: Hi my name is Brian, and I m trying to do a speech on the Samurai.  I was wondering in anyone could e-mail me some information, maybe about the beginnings, how
messages.messageBody:
Hi my name is Brian, and I'm trying to do a speech on the Samurai. I
was wondering in anyone could e-mail me some information, maybe about
the beginnings, how it was used, or how it may be used now. If you
could help me out, that would be great.

My e-mail address:

bbux4evr@...

Thanks.

Brian
